template.name: Template Net ZYXEL MGS-3712F SNMP
template.description:
ZYXEL MGS-3712F
MIBs used: ZYXEL-MGS3712F-MIB RFC1213-MIB IF-MIB
Known Issues:
Description: Incorrect handling of SNMP bulk requests. Disable the use of bulk requests in the SNMP interface settings. Version: all versions firmware Device: ZYXEL MGS-3712F
You can discuss this template or leave feedback on our forum https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-suggestions-and-feedback/422668-discussion-thread-for-official-zabbix-templates-for-zyxel
Template tooling version used: 0.38

trigger.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: No SNMP data collection
trigger.description: SNMP is not available for polling. Please check device connectivity and SNMP settings.

item.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Contact
item.description: MIB: RFC1213-MIB The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person.

item.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: CPU utilization
item.description: MIB: ZYXEL-MGS3712F-MIB Show device CPU load in %, it's the snapshot of CPU load when getting the values.

trigger.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: High CPU utilization (over {$CPU.UTIL.CRIT}% for 5m)
trigger.description: CPU utilization is too high. The system might be slow to respond.

trigger.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Firmware has changed
trigger.description: Firmware version has changed. Ack to close

item.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Location
item.description: MIB: RFC1213-MIB The physical location of this node (e.g., `telephone closet, 3rd floor').

item.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: MAC address
item.description: MIB: IF-MIB The interface's address at the protocol layer immediately `below' the network layer in the protocol stack. For interfaces which do not have such an address (e.g., a serial line), this object should contain an octet string of zero length.

item.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Hardware model name
item.description: MIB: RFC1213-MIB A textual description of the entity. This value should include the full name and version identification of the system's hardware type, software operating-system, and networking software. It is mandatory that this only contain printable ASCII characters.

trigger.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Template does not match hardware
trigger.description: This template is for Zyxel MGS-3712F, but connected to {ITEM.VALUE}

item.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Host name
item.description: MIB: RFC1213-MIB An administratively-assigned name for this managed node. By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified domain name.

trigger.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Device has been replaced (new serial number received)
trigger.description: Device serial number has changed. Ack to close

item.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Uptime
item.description: MIB: RFC1213-MIB The time (in hundredths of a second) since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Fan #{#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-MGS3712F-MIB Current speed in Revolutions Per Minute (RPM) on the fan.

trigger_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: FAN{#SNMPINDEX} is in critical state

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Administrative status
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The desired state of the interface. The testing(3) state indicates that no operational packets can be passed.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Interface name
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB A textual string containing information about the interface

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Link speed
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB An estimate of the interface's current bandwidth in bits per second

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Incoming broadcast packages
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The number of packets, delivered by this sub-layer to a higher (sub-)layer, which were addressed to a broadcast address at this sub-layer.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Incoming multicast packages
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The number of packets, delivered by this sub-layer to a higher (sub-)layer, which were addressed to a multicast address at this sub-layer. For a MAC layer protocol, this includes both Group and Functional addresses.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Incoming traffic
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The total number of octets received on the interface, including framing characters.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Incoming unicast packages
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The number of packets, delivered by this sub-layer to a higher (sub-)layer, which were not addressed to a multicast or broadcast address at this sub-layer

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Incoming utilization
item_prototype.description: Interface utilization percentage

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Link type
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-MGS3712F-MIB Physical connection type

valuemap.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F operational mode port link up type

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Interface description
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-MGS3712F-MIB A textual string containing information about the interface

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Operational status
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The current operational state of the interface. The testing(3) state indicates that no operational packets can be passed.

trigger_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Link down
trigger_prototype.description:
This trigger expression works as follows: 1. Can be triggered if operations status is down. 2. {TEMPLATE_NAME:METRIC.diff()}=1) - trigger fires only if operational status was up(1) sometime before. (So, do not fire 'ethernal off' interfaces.)
WARNING: if closed manually - won't fire again on next poll, because of .diff.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Outgoing broadcast packages
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The total number of packets that higher-level protocols requested be transmitted, and which were addressed to a broadcast address at this sub-layer, including those that were discarded or not sent.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Outgoing multicast packages
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The total number of packets that higher-level protocols requested be transmitted, and which were addressed to a multicast address at this sub-layer, including those that were discarded or not sent. For a MAC layer protocol, this includes both Group and Functional addresses.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Outgoing traffic
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The total number of octets transmitted out of the interface, including framing characters. This object is a 64-bit version of ifOutOctets.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Outgoing unicast packages
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The total number of packets that higher-level protocols requested be transmitted, and which were not addressed to a multicast or broadcast address at this sub-layer, including those that were discarded or not sent.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Outgoing utilization
item_prototype.description: Interface utilization percentage

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Speed Duplex
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-MGS3712F-MIB Transmission mode

valuemap.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F operational mode port speed duplex

override.name: Don't create triggers for matching interface

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: SFP {#ZYXEL.SFP.PORT}: {#ZYXEL.SFP.DESCRIPTION}
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-MGS3712F-MIB Transceiver module DDM data ({#ZYXEL.SFP.DESCRIPTION}).

trigger_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: SFP {#ZYXEL.SFP.PORT}: High {#ZYXEL.SFP.DESCRIPTION} (over {#ZYXEL.SFP.WARN.MAX}{#ZYXEL.SFP.UNIT})
trigger_prototype.description: The upper threshold value of the parameter is exceeded

trigger_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: SFP {#ZYXEL.SFP.PORT}: Low {#ZYXEL.SFP.DESCRIPTION} (less than {#ZYXEL.SFP.WARN.MIN}{#ZYXEL.SFP.UNIT})
trigger_prototype.description: The parameter values are less than the lower threshold

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: SFP {#SNMPINDEX}: Date code
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-MGS3712F-MIB Transceiver module vendor's manufacturing date code.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: SFP {#SNMPINDEX}: Part number
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-MGS3712F-MIB Part number provided by transceiver module vendor.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: SFP {#SNMPINDEX}: Revision
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-MGS3712F-MIB Revision level for part number provided by transceiver module vendor.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: SFP {#SNMPINDEX}: Serial number
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-MGS3712F-MIB Serial number provided by transceiver module vendor.

trigger_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: SFP {#SNMPINDEX} has been replaced (new serial number received)
trigger_prototype.description: SFP {#SNMPINDEX} serial number has changed. Ack to close

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: SFP {#SNMPINDEX}: Status
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-MGS3712F-MIB Transceiver module status.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: SFP {#SNMPINDEX}: Transceiver
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-MGS3712F-MIB Transceiver module type names.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: SFP {#SNMPINDEX}: Vendor
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-MGS3712F-MIB Transceiver module vendor name.

discovery_rule.name: Temperature discovery
discovery_rule.description: An entry in tempTable. Index of temperature unit. 1:MAC, 2:CPU, 3:PHY

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Temperature "{#ZYXEL.TEMP.ID}"
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-MGS3712F-MIB The current temperature measured at this sensor

trigger_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Temperature {#ZYXEL.TEMP.ID} is in critical state

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Nominal "{#ZYXEL.VOLT.NOMINAL}"
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-MGS3712F-MIB The current voltage reading.

trigger_prototype.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F: Voltage {#ZYXEL.VOLT.NOMINAL} is in critical state

macro.description: The time interval for SNMP agent availability trigger expression.
Triggers will be created only for interfaces whose description contains the value of this macro
Filter of discoverable link types. 0 - Down link 1 - Cooper link 2 - Fiber link
Filter to exclude discovered by link types.
Filter to exclude discovered interfaces by name.
Filter of discoverable status. 0 - OK with DDM 1 - OK without DDM 2 - nonoperational
Filter to exclude discovered by status.
Filter by discoverable SFP modules name.
Filter to exclude discovered SFP modules by name.
Receiving data from the SFP module is slow, we do not recommend setting the interval less than 10 minutes.

value_map.name: ZYXEL MGS-3712F operational mode port speed duplex
ZYXEL MGS-3712F operational mode port link up type
